Package model.zenGame

Class GameplayZen

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.zenGame.GameplayZen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class GameplayZen
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    GameplayZen is a class that manages a Zen L'initie gameplay
    Author:
    Godet Louis-Xavier
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected char[] ALPHABET_ABSCISSA
      This attribute is a correspondance table where the letters are ordered in alphabetical order and the index in this tab is the position on the grid.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Pawn> blackChain
      The black chain linked to the zen pawn
      private java.util.ArrayList<Pawn> blackPawns
      The list of black pawns placed in the grid (the maximum is 12)
      private Player currentPlayer
      the current player who must play his turn
      private Player firstPlayer
      a first player of a Zen l'initie game party (the first player is always a human)
      private java.lang.String gameName
      The name of the game which will be the name of the save file
      private SquareGrid[][] grid
      the grid of the Zen L'initie game
      private int GRID_HEIGHT_WIDTH
      the size of the grid : 11x11 (width x height)
      private java.util.ArrayList<SquareGrid> listOfMoves
      A list of squares where there moves can be possible for a selected pawn
      private OpponentType opponentType
      the type of the opponent player : either a human, either a computer
      private SquareGrid previousZenPosition
      The previous position of zen pawn saved in order to ban the next player to replace it
      private Player secondPlayer
      a second player of a Zen l'initie game party (human or computer)
      private SquareGrid selectedSquare
      The selected pawn in the grid by a player
      private static long serialVersionUID
      Default UID
      private java.util.ArrayList<Pawn> whiteChain
      The white chain linked to the zen pawn
      private java.util.ArrayList<Pawn> whitePawns
      The list of white pawns placed in the grid (the maximum is 12)
      private boolean zenEnnemy
      Tells if the user consider the zen pawn as an ennemy or not.
      private Pawn zenPawn
      The Zen pawn which a player must make a chain with his pawns

      GameplayZen initializes a game manager for a Zen l'initie party The parameters of the game are fill by the inputs of the user

      • ALPHABET_ABSCISSA

        protected final char[] ALPHABET_ABSCISSA
        This attribute is a correspondance table where the letters are ordered in alphabetical order and the index in this tab is the position on the grid. It is use to translate the letter input by the human player to a number

        private final int GRID_HEIGHT_WIDTH
        the size of the grid : 11x11 (width x height)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameplayZen

        public GameplayZen​(java.lang.String gameName,
                   OpponentType opponent,
                   java.lang.String firstName,
                   java.lang.String secondName,
                   TypeOfPawn pawnFirstPlayer,
                   TypeOfPawn pawnSecondPlayer)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        GameplayZen initializes a game manager for a Zen l'initie party The parameters of the game are fill by the inputs of the user
        Parameters:
        gameName - : the name of the game (also the name of the save file)
        opponent - : the type of the main user's opponent
        firstName - : the name of the first player
        secondName - : the name of the second player
        pawnFirstPlayer - : the type of pawn chosen by the first player
        pawnSecondPlayer - : the type of pawn chosen by the second player
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        private void iniGridAndPawns()

        Parameters:

      • selectSquare

        public boolean selectSquare​(int[] selectCoordinates)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the square which coordinates are gived throught parameters selected.
        Parameters:
        selectCoordinates - : the coordinates of the square concerned
        Returns:
        true if the selection has been successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        public int[] getDigitCoordinates​(java.lang.String coordinates)
        Translates coordinates from letternumber to numbernumber
        Parameters:
        coordinates - : the coordinates writed like that : LETTERNUMBER
        Returns:
        : the coordinates writed like that : NUMBERNUMBER

        Calculs and checks diagonally the possibles moves for the selected pawn

      • verifyRules

        private boolean verifyRules​(int xMove,
                            int yMove)
        Verify most of the rules of zen l'initie game
        Parameters:
        xMove - : the x coordinate of the square where the player want to move
        yMove - : the y coordinate of the square where the player want to move
        Returns:
        true if the move respects the rules of zen l'initie, false if not

      • calculMove

        public java.util.ArrayList<SquareGrid> calculMove()
        Asks the user to input coordinates of square he want to move Checks if the inputs are in the list of possible moves Moves the pawn selected if the input is correct
        Returns:
        a list of square where the player can move his owned pawn

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove​(SquareGrid targetPosition)
        Play the turn by making the movement decided by the player
        Parameters:
        targetPosition - : the position targeted by the player

      • movePawn

        public void movePawn​(SquareGrid squarePosition)
        Moves the pawn selected to the square wanted
        Parameters:
        squarePosition - : the square which the user wants to move his pawn

      • removePawn

        public void removePawn​(SquareGrid squarePosition)
        Removes the opponent pawn presents in the square targeted by a player, according to the rules of Zen l'initie
        Parameters:
        squarePosition - : the square targeted where the opponent pawn is presents

      • calculZenChain

        public void calculZenChain()
        Calculs the zen chain by look around the zen pawn what pawns there are

      • researchBeyond

        private void researchBeyond​(Pawn pawn,
                            TypeOfPawn type)
        Researches recursively the pawns forming the chain
        Parameters:
        pawn - : the pawn to look around what pawns are next it
        type - : the type of the pawn to compare with pawns beyond

      • beyondListCheck

        private java.util.ArrayList<Pawn> beyondListCheck​(Pawn pawn,
                                                  TypeOfPawn type)
        Researches beyond the pawn specified the pawns with the same type
        Parameters:
        pawn - : the pawn to look around what pawns are next it
        type - : the type of the pawn to compare with pawns beyond
        Returns:
        the list of pawns beyond with the same type of the pawn specified

      • alreadyInChain

        private boolean alreadyInChain​(Pawn pawn)
        Says if the pawn is already include in the calcul of zen chain
        Parameters:
        pawn - : the pawn to check if it is include in the calcul of zen chain
        Returns:
        true if the pawn to check is already in the calcul of zen chain, false if it is not

      • allPawnTouch

        public GameState allPawnTouch()
        Tells if all pawns owned by the current player touch the Zen pawn
        Returns:
        true if all pawns touch the zen (victory for the current player), false if it's not the case
